articles.headline: Pain for Australians as inflation skyrockets
articles.description: Annual consumer price index inflation has reached its highest in more than three decades, according to the Australia Bureau of Statistics.

articles.headline: Big W causes frenzy over $40 Nike sale
articles.description: Big W has surprised shoppers by heavily discounting one of the most popular sporting brands, sending fans into a frenzy.

articles.headline: Brand removes controversial ingredient
articles.description: The iconic Australian chocolate brand will change the ingredients for over 100 of its products â€“ and is now calling on other companies to do the same.
